entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet runtime package store does not work for net8.0? #39918
  • [dotnet format] JSON report does not distinguish between found and fixed diagnostics #39913

Closed

  • Sometimes build and sometimes error #39753
    Discussion
  • Support for SxS workload manifests #32236
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Workload Install Type Output for Other SDK Versions #39923
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Change GetDirectoryNameOfFileAbove to GetPathOfFileAbove where appropriate #39911
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix loading of rollback installed workloads in Visual Studio #39901
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Don't use the xunit return code when running in helix only #39271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2419606 #39828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Rewrite dotnet watch command line parsing #39618
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add nuget.localization to depencency flow #39595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget.localization to codeflow #39591
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enabling codeflow of nuget.localization #39590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39588
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39589
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nuget localization to the dependency flow #39584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workload config command #39888
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the help text for dotnet tool run and dotnet tool local install #39827
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update the compiling version to the latest MSBuild from that band to fix scanner issues #39896
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Wasm] Remove workarounds #39689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
